title: Ep289 Deep Deep South Crimes
description:
This week, the gals go way south to chat about some gruesome local cases. Topics include a monkeys-only island, a very violent cult sacrifice, and a bizarre brothel showdown. Knock back a shot of José Cuervo and some Corona, look hard for that left arm, and tune in for Deep Deep South Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
